title: ICE: bx.cx().is_backend_scalar_pair(cast): dyn star

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code `./src/test/ui/dyn-star/dont-unsize-coerce-dyn-star.rs` ```Rust // check-pass #![feature(dyn_star)] #![allow(incomplete_features)] trait AddOne { fn add1(&mut self) -> usize; } impl AddOne for usize { fn add1(&mut self) -> usize { *self += 1; *self } } fn add_one(i: &mut (dyn* AddOne + '_)) -> usize { i.add1() } fn main() { let mut x = 42usize as dyn* AddOne; println!("{}", add_one(&mut x)); println!("{}", add_one(&mut x)); } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.67.0-nightly (ff8c8dfbe 2022-11-22) binary: rustc commit-hash: ff8c8dfbe66701531e3e5e335c28c544d0fbc945 commit-date: 2022-11-22 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.67.0-nightly LLVM version: 15.0.4 ``` ### Error output ``` ```
Backtrace
